features: Constructed with 50% recycled waxed polyester canvas that is 5x stronger and 3x more water resistant than traditional waxed cotton canvas
Attain the perfect fit with 10 cm/4 in of torso adjustability
Versatile hydration sleeve is constructed with air mesh to double as a laptop sleeve that fits up to a 15" MacBook®
Quickly access often-used gear through front shove-it pocket, accessible from both inside and outside of bag
Keep a phone or snacks within reach in the convenient hipbelt pockets
Stay cool on any adventure with a breathable backpanel
Store additional items in the front and top zippered pockets
Lash gear to the outside of the pack with side compression straps and daisy chains
Easily secure hiking poles or ice axe on attachment loop
Gear stays dry during storms with high-visibility, removable rain cover
Material: 50% Recycled Waxed 600D Polyester Canvas; Bluesign Certified 600D Polyester
